text: The Homecoming Saga is a science fiction series by Orson Scott Card. The series is patterned on the Book of Mormon. Some of the names also come from the Book of Mormon. ==Books== * The Memory of Earth (1992) * The Call of Earth (1992) * The Ships of Earth (1994) * Earthfall (1995) * Earthborn (1995) Category:Homecoming Saga
title: Homecoming Saga
